DOC.brief_summary: This study aim measure effect neurobiologically-guided intensive family base treatment adult anorexia nervosa .
DOC.criteria: Current diagnosis anorexia nervosa Illness onset least 2 year prior study Medically stable Identified carer participate treatment participant Developmental intellectual disorder Diagnosis substance abuse dependence 3 month prior study Current suicidal thought Severe comorbid psychiatric disorder ( e.g. , psychotic disorder , bipolar disorder )
